pageContext.title: Refresh Theme Zoom Slider (PRO)
pageContext.miniDescription: Beautiful, smooth and improved zoom for the Refresh theme product pages. Fully responsive, works on mobile and desktop.
pageContext.description:
Improve your Refresh's theme zoom by adding arrows, a smooth slideshow and responsive images.


No more overly sized images and uncomfortable scrolling whenever your clients need to have a better view of your products.

Coded by a certified Shopify Partner.

Simple copy-pasting, no headaches, no monthly fees.

→ Live Demo ←

What you'll get:


Once installed, this plugin automatically enables a "click to zoom" feature for your Refresh theme. Here are all the main features:


- Swipe through the images of the opened lightbox
- Works with all Refresh layouts

- Super smooth performance
- Subtle, pleasant animations
- Pinch to zoom enabled

- Automatically skips videos; only images are shown within the lightbox

- Activation works exactly the same as the original Refresh theme - simply click on the magnifying glass icon. No modifications.

- Life time free updates

- Life time free bug fixes

- Constantly maintained and improved


Installation:


Simply copy and paste the code snippet from this file to your theme.


Detailed instructions can be found here.

relatedProducts.title: Slideshow Section (PRO)
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Premium slideshow section. More than 50 customization options. Works on all themes, no apps required.
relatedProducts.description:
The Slideshow Section (PRO) is a code snippet that adds a gorgeous slideshow section to your theme. Carefully crafted by certified Shopify Partners.

No apps.
Compatible with all themes. (paid, free or custom made.)
Loads faster than any app.

→ Live Demo ←








What you'll get:


This code works out of the box with any theme using sections.


At the customize page you'll be able to change options to your liking, such as:


- Multiple height options: set an unique height for desktop and mobile devices



- Parallax: keep the image still when scrolling. Enable on mobile only, desktop only or both.



- Autoplay: automatically goes to the next image every X seconds. You can choose any value from 3 to 20 seconds.
- Navigation: Choose between dots, bars or none. Colors are fully customizable, plus you can customize the dots' size. (the bars size can not be customized).




- Arrows: show arrows on desktop and/or on mobile devices. Size and colors fully customizable.



- Text animations: enable or disable text animations when changing from slide to slide.
- Image: use any image for desktop and, optionally, a different one for mobile. Control the focal point of each image to ensure the subject of your photo is visible. You can also show images full width, without cutting them off.



- Lazyload: the section loads only images that are visible to improve performance
- Text: control all text, font sizes, set unique values for desktop & mobile. Absolute freedom:



- Text alignment: control where to align your text (left, center, right, bottom left, bottom center & bottom right). You can set individual options for each slide. The first slide can have its text aligned to the left and the second to the right, for example.



- Buttons: add up to two buttons for each slide. Full ability to customize the link, text, text color, border color background color and font size. You can also make the whole image clickable instead.



- Text shadow: add a shadow behind the text to improve readability. Customizable color and intensity
- Image overlay: darken images to improve readability. Customizable color and intensity
- Image change animation: choose between fade or slide
- Use as many sections as you wish on a single page
- Fully compatible with Online Store 2.0
- Make the Slideshow match any theme's design with multiple color & size control options


Installation:


Installation takes 30 seconds. Please find detailed instructions clicking here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to us at:


ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Question: Does it work with videos?

Answer: No, the Slideshow Section (PRO) does not work with videos.

Q. I need custom coding in this slideshow. Can you do it?
A. Yes, we do offer custom coding as an additional service, it is not included in the price of the slideshow. Please email us with your website URL and further details for a more accurate quote.

Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see on the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds. However we do guarantee the slideshow will work on any theme with sections.


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Collections Tabs
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Showcase your best products with an easy-to-browse tabbed collections section.
relatedProducts.description:
The Collection Tabs is a code snippet that adds a tabbed collection section to your theme. Improve your website's UX and give comfort to your users while they browse multiple products with minimum effort.

No apps.
Compatible with all themes. (paid, free or custom made.)
Loads faster than any app.

→ Live Demo ←



What you'll get:


This code works out of the box with any theme.


At the customize page you'll be able to change options to your liking, such as:


- Background color
- Section's width (full width, automatic, custom)




- Section's top and bottom margin (individual values for desktop & mobile)

- Carousel or grid layout



- Products limit (show from 4 to 49 products per tab)
- Products per row (unique values for desktop/mobile)
- Gap between products (unique values for desktop/mobile)
- Loop carousel



- Free scroll - don't snap images when user is scrolling (unique values for desktop/mobile)

- Product title (edit the font weight, font size and color)
- Product price (edit the font weight, font size and color)
- Product "compare price" (edit the font weight, font size and color)
- Product "starting from": whenever a product has variant with multiple prices, you can add a "starting from" text. This text's size and text are customizable, as well as its visibility.

- Second image on hover: disable or show product's second or last image on hover.

- Border radius: add rounded border to the images.


- Lazyload: show images only when they're visible on screen. improves performance.



- Image size: choose whatever image size fits your images the best. Unique sizes for mobile/desktop.



- Title & subtitle font size (unique value for desktop/mobile)

- Title & subtitle alignment (left, center, right)

- Title & subtitle font weight

- Title & subtitle letter spacing

- Title & subtitle color

- Title & subtitle bottom and top margin

- Subtitle position (above or below the title)

- Tabs font size (unique value for desktop/mobile), letter spacing, color, hover color and active color are customizable.

- Space between tabs (unique values for desktop/mobile)

- Tabs font weight

- Arrows: show arrows on desktop and/or on mobile devices. Size, position and colors fully customizable.



- Progress bar: show a progress bar below the section.



- Sale badges: customize colors, text, border radius, position, text and size.



- Button: add a button below the section that leads to any link you wish. Fully customizable.



- Animations: choose between 5 animations or disable it.



- Use as many sections as you wish on the same page
- Fully compatible with Online Store 2.0



- Add to cart with dropdown picker (update image in real when variant has an associated image)

- Arrows for each individual product

Installation:


Installation takes 30 seconds. Please find detailed instructions clicking here.

If you have any questions just reach out to us at:
